member.name: T:RaphaëlBardini.WinClean.Logic.ScriptAdvised
member.summary: If a script is advised for general purpose

member.name: F:RaphaëlBardini.WinClean.Logic.ScriptAdvised.Yes
member.summary: The script is advised for any user. It has almost no side effects and won't hinder features the said user might want to use. It can be selected automatically.

member.name: F:RaphaëlBardini.WinClean.Logic.ScriptAdvised.Limited
member.summary: The script only advised for users who want advanced optimisation. It may hinder useful system features. It should be selected individually by the user.

member.name: F:RaphaëlBardini.WinClean.Logic.ScriptAdvised.No
member.summary: The script must be selected only by users who know what they are doing. It will almost certainly hinder useful system features. It should be selected by the user, only if specifically needed.
